metadata.description: Dated at end: 21 floréal de l'an 5 de la République française
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
"Extrait des registres des délibérations et arrêtés de l'administration du département des Ardennes"--P. [3]-6

metadata.notes: Irregular pagination. No page number 10. Page number 12 listed twice. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found.
